QuestData.Title: The Mighty U'cha
QuestData.Description: Looking around, you see bits of red fur laying around this part of the cave. It appears to match the consistency of gorilla fur.$b$bBased on your conversations with Gremix, you know that he would almost certainly be interested in a red gorilla hide, if you were to obtain one.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This is your best guess as to what a red gorilla might look like.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring U'cha's Pelt to Gremix at Mossy Pile.
QuestData.CompletionText: Red fur? What're you waiting for! Go back and get that red gorilla! I'll pay you double!
QuestData.RewardText: Wow, look at this one! Not just the color, but the size of it... you could cover a tauren with this.$b$bHere you go, $n. You've earned this. Stick around, I'm sure we can find something else for you to do.
